titleStmt.title: Bloody news from Covent Garden; being a true relation, how one Mr. Bulger, an Irish gentleman, who committed a horrible and bloody murther near the three-tun tavern, in Chandois-Street: and of a baker's wife that is secured for the same fact

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
